vogar

Class Expectation

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.Expectation

  • final class Expectation
extends java.lang.Object
    The expected result of an action execution. This is typically encoded in the expectations text file, which has the following format: 
     test java.io.StreamTokenizer.Reset
 result UNSUPPORTED
 pattern .*should get token \[, but get -1.*

 # should we fix this?
 test java.util.Arrays.CopyMethods
 result COMPILE_FAILED
 pattern .*cannot find symbol.*

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long bug
      The tracking bug ID
      private boolean bugIsOpen
      True if the identified bug still active.
      private java.lang.String description

      static java.util.regex.Pattern MATCH_ALL_PATTERN
      The pattern to use when no expected output is specified
      private java.util.regex.Pattern pattern
      The pattern the expected output will match.
      private Result result
      The action's expected result, such as EXEC_FAILED.
      (package private) static Expectation SUCCESS
      The expectation of a general successful run.
      private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags
      Attributes of this test.
